title: Star Trek Fans Call for Removal of Section 31 in Upcoming Movie
description: Star Trek, the iconic science fiction franchise, has long been a source of fascination and debate among fans. One of the most contentious topics within the Star Trek community is the inclusion of Section 31 in the franchise’s canon. Initially introduced as a clandestine division within the Federation, Section 31 operates in secrecy, conducting covert […]
